example.name: supplement as subject
example.text: But in private meetings yesterday, Budget Director Richard Darman argued that only $1.5 billion in new federal appropriations are needed [*-1] [*] to supplement existing resources.

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mary supplemented the meagre payments from John's life insurance policy with various acts of minor shoplifting.
